text:
<!channel>,
gentle reminder, that we need the information about who you want to work with in a group or whether you want to work alone next week. Please tell us as soon as possible. I missed to follow up on this on Friday. The teaching team needs to assign themselves to you for morning stand-ups. So far we only know from Team "Happiness" - Novi, Jennifer, Uros, Axana <https://da-ft-ber-05-21.slack.com/archives/C021UM94GLU/p1624627524110400>

attachments.fallback:
[June 25th, 2021 6:25 AM] florian.titze: <!channel>,
*Re: Week5 project*
Please everyone answer in this thread who you intend to work with for the project next week and at best give yourself a name! If you work in a group, answer by one spokesperson of course is sufficient
